actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 12A of the Federal Reserve Act to provide for steady, noninflationary growth in the money supply.

summary.text: Money Supply Control Act of 1979 - Amends the Federal Reserve Act to require that the time, character, and volume of all purchases and sales of paper eligible for open-market operations be governed with a view to: (1) maintaining a constant general level of domestic prices; (2) avoiding destabilizing changes in total purchasing power; and (3) fostering a steady growth in the aggregate currency in circulation plus all deposit balances at commercial banks less the demand deposits of foreign commercial banks and official institutions.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 12A of the Federal Reserve Act to provide for steady, noninflationary growth in the money supply.
